018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang;
019
020import static java.lang.Boolean.getBoolean;
021import static java.lang.System.out;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_IS_TEST;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
027
028import java.io.PrintStream;
029import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
030import java.util.function.Function;
031import java.util.function.Supplier;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
037
038/**
039 *  <p>{@summary Some functions for DEBUG and TEST output to the console.}</p>
040 *
041 *  @version $Id: DebugOutput.java 992 2022-01-16 19:51:31Z tquadrat $
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @UMLGraph.link
044 *  @since 0.1.0
045 */
046@UtilityClass
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: DebugOutput.java 992 2022-01-16 19:51:31Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
049public final class DebugOutput
050{
051        /*------------------------*\
052    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
053        \*------------------------*/
054    /**
055     *  The DEBUG flag.
056     *
057     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG
058     */
059    private static final boolean m_IsDebug;
060
061    /**
062     *  The TEST flag.
063     *
064     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST
065     */
066    private static final boolean m_IsTest;
067
068    static
069    {
070        m_IsDebug = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG );
071        m_IsTest = getBoolean( PROPERTY_IS_TEST );
072    }
073
074        /*--------------*\
075    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
076        \*--------------*/
077    /**
078     *  No instance is allowed for this class!
079     */
080    private DebugOutput() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( DebugOutput.class ); }
081
082        /*---------*\
083    ====** Methods **==========================================================
084        \*---------*/
085    /**
086     *  If the
087     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
088     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
089     *  is set, execute the given
090     *  {@link Function}
091     *  and write the result to
092     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
093     *
094     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Function} for the output.
095     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
096     */
097    public static final void debugOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
098    {
099        if( m_IsDebug )
100        {
101            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
102            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message );
103        }
104    }   //  debugOutput()
105
106    /**
107     *  If the
108     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
109     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
110     *  is set and the given
111     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
112     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
113     *  {@link Function}
114     *  and write the result to
115     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
116     *
117     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
118     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
119     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
120     */
121    public static final void debugOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
122    {
123        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )
124        {
125            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
126            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message );
127        }
128    }   //  debugOutput()
129
130    /**
131     *  If the
132     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
133     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
134     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
135     *  given
136     *  {@link Function}
137     *  and write the result to
138     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
139     *
140     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
141     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
142     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
143     */
144    public static final void debugOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
145    {
146        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
147        {
148            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
149            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "DEBUG: %s%n", message );
150        }
151    }   //  debugOutput()
152
153    /**
154     *  <p>{@summary If the
155     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
156     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_DEBUG}
157     *  is set, a call to
158     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
159     *  is made.}</p>
160     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
161     *
162     *  @param  e   The exception.
163     */
164    public static final void debugOutput( final Throwable e )
165    {
166        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
167        {
168            out.print( "DEBUG: " );
169            e.printStackTrace( out );
170        }
171    }   //  debugOutput()
172
173    /**
174     *  If the
175     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
176     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
177     *  is set, execute the given
178     *  {@link Function}
179     *  and write the result to
180     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
181     *
182     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
183     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
184     */
185    public static final void testOutput( final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
186    {
187        if( m_IsTest )
188        {
189            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
190            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "TEST_: %s%n", message );
191        }
192    }   //  testOutput()
193
194    /**
195     *  If the
196     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
197     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
198     *  is set and the given
199     *  {@link BooleanSupplier condition}
200     *  resolves to {@code true}, execute the given
201     *  {@link Function}
202     *  and write the result to
203     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
204     *
205     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
206     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
207     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
208     */
209    public static final void testOutput( final BooleanSupplier condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
210    {
211        if( m_IsDebug && requireNonNullArgument( condition, "condition" ).getAsBoolean() )
212        {
213            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
214            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "TEST_: %s%n", message );
215        }
216    }   //  testOutput()
217
218    /**
219     *  If the
220     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
221     *  {@value org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
222     *  is set and the given condition resolves to {@code true}, execute the
223     *  given
224     *  {@link Supplier}
225     *  and write the result to
226     *  {@link System#out System.out}.
227     *
228     *  @param  condition   Only if {@code true}, there will be an output.
229     *  @param  supplier    The {@code Supplier} for the output.
230     *  @param  args    Optional argument for the {@code supplier}.
231     */
232    public static final void testOutput( final boolean condition, final Function<Object [],String> supplier, final Object... args )
233    {
234        if( m_IsDebug && condition )
235        {
236            final var message = requireNonNullArgument( supplier, "supplier" ).apply( requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" ) );
237            if( nonNull( message ) && !message.isBlank() ) out.printf( "TEST_: %s%n", message );
238        }
239    }   //  testOutput()
240
241    /**
242     *  <p>{@summary If the
243     *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String) System property}
244     *  {@value CommonConstants#PROPERTY_IS_TEST}
245     *  is set, a call to
246     *  {@link Throwable#printStackTrace(PrintStream) e.printStackTrace( out )}
247     *  is made.}</p>
248     *  <p>Use this to get a view to an otherwise ignored exception.</p>
249     *
250     *  @param  e   The exception.
251     */
252    public static final void testOutput( final Throwable e )
253    {
254        if( m_IsDebug && nonNull( e ) )
255        {
256            out.print( "TEST_: " );
257            e.printStackTrace( out );
258        }
259    }   //  testOutput()
260}
261//  class DebugOutput
262
263/*
264 *  End of File
265 */
